TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewHeaderRowPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GridViewRowPresenterBase

summary.span: 表示定义列标题的行布局所用的对象。

span.span: Represents an object that is used to define the layout of a row of column headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这对象和对象是用于支持对象的列中显示数据的模式。This object and objects are support objects for the mode that displays data in columns for a . 有关如何定义查看，请参阅[GridView 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview.md)。For more information about how to define a view, see the [GridView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview.md). 你可以确定当列移动到新位置通过监视为定义的事件。You can determine when a column is moving to a new location by monitoring the event that is defined for the . 你可以自定义中的列标题使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先级的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列是否可更改位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether columns can change positions.

value.span: 如果可通过拖放列标题的操作来移动列，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if columns can be moved by the drag-and-drop operation of a column header; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您实现此类的一部分视图模式中，此属性的值绑定到的值属性。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 你可以自定义中的列标题使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先级的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 当你设置样式时，则某些限制。When you set styles, some restrictions apply. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see the [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ColumnHeaderStringFormat { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers if they are displayed as strings.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果， ，或属性设置，则将忽略此属性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 多个属性可用于指定列标题的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果设置了多个属性，使用具有最高优先级的属性的值格式化列标题。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以在几种类型上设置列的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 以下列表显示可用于格式化列标题，按从低到高优先级的顺序排列的属性：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示列标题的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template to use to display the column headers.

value.span: 用于显示列标题内容的 。

span.span: The that is used to display the column header content.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您实现此类的一部分视图模式中，此属性的值绑定到的值属性。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 如果属性和都设置属性，优先。If the property and the property are both set, the takes precedence. 你可以自定义中的列标题使用在此类和相关类中找到的属性的各种视图模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性，以及它们之间的优先级的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnLostMouseCapture(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnLostMouseCapture (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于 的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事件发生时列移动到新位置，则会取消移动。If a event occurs while a column is moving to a new position, the move is canceled. 此实现不处理事件。This implementation does not handle the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonDown(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonDown (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于当用户在 内按下鼠标左键时发生的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user presses the left mouse button inside a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，此方法准备要拖动到列标题行中的其他位置的列。If is `true`, this method prepares a column to be dragged to another location in the column header row. 此实现处理事件通过设置事件自变量`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting the event argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonUp(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonUp (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于当用户释放鼠标左键时发生的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user releases the left mouse button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，并且如果事件发生在将列拖到新位置之后，移动列。If is `true`, and if the event occurs after a column is dragged to a new location, the column is moved. 此实现处理事件通过设置事件自变量`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting the event argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseMove(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseMove (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于当用户移动鼠标时发生的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user moves the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`并且用户按下鼠标左键，此方法实现用户拖动时发生的可视行为到新位置。If the property is set to `true` and the user presses the left mouse button, this method implements the visual behavior that occurs when the user drags a to a new location. 此方法重写集事件自变量`true`为即使用户没有按下鼠标左键的事件。This method override sets the event argument to `true` for the event even if the user does not press the left mouse button.
